overview: Arriving Somewhere... is the first live performance DVD by British progressive rock band Porcupine Tree.  A full show from the Deadwing tour filmed by "Studio M" with nine HD cameras at Park West, Chicago on 11 & 12 October 2005, edited by Lasse Hoile, with the soundtrack mixed in stereo and 5.1 surround sound by Steven Wilson, and mastered by Darcy Proper.
title: Porcupine Tree: Arriving Somewhere...
